The relative or full URL for Data synchronization
The interval on which the current location on the map is updated
Enables navigation to any point on the map, when long-pressed
Display advanced data in location info dialog
Defines whether to use non-GPS coordinates in data.
The units in which to display area size
The relative or full URL for storing log data

Sets if communication data should be saved to files

NFC reader is disabled. Do you want to open system settings and enable it?
Last updated more than 24 hours ago. Wait until synchronization with the server is complete:
Last updated more than 24 hours ago.
Connect to internet and wait until synchronization with the server is complete:
The work-flow screens were syncrhonized successfully
Data to be sent: %1$d image(s) and %2$d data record(s)
The latest update contains errors. Please contact technical support.
Your login info has expired. Please Log out and Log in again.
Your access rights for using the mobile application have expired. Please log in with a different user.
The memory of the mobile device is insufficient for the number of farms and plots that are assigned to your user. Please contact technical support.
The memory of the mobile device is insufficient.
There is invalid data stored in memory. Please contact technical support.
Server communication error. Please try again or contact support.
There was an error reading / writing of your memory card.
Error reading / writing to memory card.
There was an error due to insufficient memory. Please contact technical support.
There was an error due to invalid system configuration. Please contact technical support.
The scanner is not enabled or is not connected.
Cancel the inspection flow (all entered data will be lost)?
Cancel the screen (all data in the screen will be lost)?
Failed to start the last flow. Do you want to restart it (all entered data will be lost)?
Failed to restart the last flow. Please synchronize and start anew.
Failed to load screen configuration. Please make sure you are connected to the Internet.
Not all data elements were recorded. Please try again or restart the flow.
Failed to execute the command. Please try again.
There was an application logic error. Please contact support.
You have denied the permissions required to capture photos. Please enable Storage and Camera permissions in the system settings.
You have denied the permission required to add photo. Please enable the Storage permission in the system settings.
GPS location is disabled.\nThe application cannot attach location information to the data.
GPS coordinates are not sufficiently accurate.
Please wait at least %1$d seconds for accurate coordinates.
Please wait at least half a minute for accurate coordinates.
Please wait at least one and a half minute for accurate coordinates.
Please wait at least %1$d minutes for accurate coordinates.
Please wait at least %1$d and a half minutes for accurate coordinates.
Wait until you receive a full GPS icon:
%1$s is less than the minimum allowed value of %2$s
%1$s is more than the maximum allowed value of %2$s
%1$s contains less characters than the minimum allowed length of %2$s
%1$s contains more characters than the maximum allowed length of %2$s
%1$s is earlier than the minimum allowed date of %2$s
%1$s is later than the maximum allowed date of %2$s
%1$s is earlier than the minimum allowed time of %2$s
%1$s is later than the maximum allowed time of %2$s
GPS location is not within the required accuracy. See the GPS indicator and submit the form when the indicator shows full circle.
Please select an option from the list
Please select an option for list %1$s
The list has no data. Please cancel and contact technical support.
The list "%1$s" has no data. Please cancel and contact technical support.
Faield to capture photo. Please try again.
There are no saved records found
You are about to delete all saved records. Do you want to proceed?
No current location to center on
Visible sensors and traps\nthat are associated with the plot
There are no actions available for the selected location. Please check that the location is in active season.
to write the scanned\ndata to it\"
Press the button\nto scan a barcode
The NFC function of your device is disabled. Do you want to enable it?

Press the Scan Barcode button, place the barcode in the scan area and move the phone slightly back and forth until successful scan.\nThen touch the card until you see a green icon with success message.
Invalid greenhouse configuration. Please contact technical support.
The left or right locations are not adjacent or are not part of the route.
Both locations are empty! You need to specify at least one.
The route is not initialized. You need to specify start location and direction if required.
You are at the end of the route. You cannot advance forward.
You are at the start of the route. You cannot go back to a previous location.
The application failed to advance the greenhouse location. Please try again or contact technical support.
The application failed to go back to a preceding greenhouse location. Please try again or contact technical support
You must set the next bed pair you will advance to
The beds seem to be reversed. Use \"Reverse Beds\" to swap them.
You are at the end of the greenhouse route. You can report additional data only if you reset the route.
This will be supported in the next version
The file wasn\'t deleted because of an unexpected error
The file is being sent to the server right now. Try to delete it using the web application
The file is already sent to the server. Try to delete it using the web application
It seems you haven\'t finished all stops in your task, are you sure you want to mark it as complete ?
No sensors/traps associated with this plot
Choose two points to set the bays baseline
Select a range of bays or an individual bay, then select the amount of poles in this bay/s.
Post distance in line with gutter
Choose from the suggested common types or add a new custom type of your own
Select a range of bays or an individual bay, then select the number of posts in this bay/s and press on the update icon.
Select from which side to adjust the width of the bays by using the toggle switch control ( T=Top / B=Bottom of bays )
Select the side you want to add/remove bays in case that our calculation is inaccurate
Amount of plant lines per bay
Post distance in line with gutter
Must be positive number, more than 0
Insert the number of posts located between the corridor and the baseline
1.Insert the amount of lines from each side of the T corridor inside the bay
Schematic map is\n ready for scouting
Re-name the first bay from each side of the corridor to change the numbering sequence
Re-name the first line from each side of the corridor to change the numbering sequence
Define the baseline of the structure by selecting two points.
The baseline should be the widest side.
Click on the switcher icon to change the order of bays.
Define the main corridor placement by Insert the number of posts located between the corridor to the selected baseline.
If the corridor is on the edge of the greenhouse, insert the number “0” posts.
First, change the first line name by selecting the side of the corridor in which you would like to change the numbering (Topside =Above corridor, Bottom side=below corridor)
Choose if the numbering order from the first line is Ascending /Descending
Input the name you would like to change to. The name can contain numbers and letters.
First, select a range of bays or an individual bay.
Second, select the number of posts in this bay/s and press on the update icon.
Third, select from which side to adjust the width of the bays by using the switch control.( T=Top / B=Bottom of bays )
First, select if you’d like to add or remove bays.
Second, choose the side you want to add them. ( R=Right, L=Left )
Third, enter the amount of bays you’d like to add/remove by clicking on the arrows.
First, select the bay in which the T corridor is located
Third, insert the amount of lines before and after the corridor inside that bay and choose the correct numbering method
Example for a case in which the T corridor is subtracting 2 rows:
The first value can\'t be more than last value
The value can\'t be more than max bay value
Amount of lines is too high
Name must include at least one number
In order to change the length of the line, insert the start and the end posts of the selected lines
* insert 0 in both fields to disable line
Wrong input, please insert number of posts
End post cannot be lower than start post
Start and end cannot be negative
Amount of posts is too high
Amount of bays is too high
The chosen baseline can\'t be handled. Please choose another one
Do you want to exit from definition of the greenhouse?
Are you sure you want to cancel drawing the polygon on the map?
Are you sure you want to cancel adding a point on the map?
Click on a location in the map in order to place a dot.\nMove/delete dot: click on an existing dot to open the delete and move buttons.\n
A group or cluster of %s within a grower
From: date of %s creation.\n\nUntil: when specified, means that the %s is inactive and it is only kept in history records.

From: the beginning of the season for this %s.

Until: the end date of the season.

Note: you need to define a season date to be able to fill reports to it.
Please set the date for the %s
Please set the date for the season
Please set the crop type for the trap/sensor
Are you sure you want to quit add location and discard entered data ?
Please note: Area set differs from polygon area: %s
External ID usually supports integration with other systems and will be an alternative to the %s name
Until date cannot be set to a date earlier than from date
The %s will be added to the system in a few seconds and will be ready for reporting.
The %s has been added, you can now fill new reports to it.
In order to report to the newly created %s, please make sure you have an internet connection to register the %s in the project.
Are you sure you wish to exit the edit mode?\nAll changes will be discarded.
Please fill missing used amount first
Did not find crop to assign to this trap type. (Please contact support)
Hive created and will be available for reporting in a moment.
Trap created and will be available for reporting in a moment.
Go ahead and save the location ?
Please enable gps and start again.
